sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_betting(USERID, DATE, RATE, MONEY, EXPECT, STATUS, TOTAL_COUNT) VALUES(#userId#, #date#, #rate#, #money#, #expect#, #status#, #totalCount#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tbl_betting b SET SUCCESS_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND bg.GUESS = g.RESULT AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID ) WHERE b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#);

UPDATE tbl_betting b SET FAILURE_COUNT = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_betting_game bg, tbl_game g WHERE bg.GAME_ID = g.ID AND bg.GUESS != g.RESULT AND bg.BETTING_ID = b.ID ) WHERE b.ID in (SELECT BETTING_ID FROM tbl_betting_game bg2 WHERE bg2.GAME_ID = #value#);
UPDATE tbl_betting SET STATUS = (CASE WHEN FAILURE_COUNT > 0 THEN 'BS003' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = CANCEL_COUNT THEN 'BS005' WHEN TOTAL_COUNT = (SUCCESS_COUNT + CANCEL_COUNT) THEN 'BS002' ELSE 'BS001' END)
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_betting b WHERE ID = #value#
SELECT * FROM tbl_betting b WHERE USERID = #userId# LIMIT #pageIndex#, #pageSize#
SELECT * FROM tbl_betting b WHERE b.ID = #bettingId# AND b.USERID = #userId#
